name: Black Label Trading Co. - Deliverance Nocturne - Short Salomon
brand: Black Label Trading Co., Deliverance Nocturne
additionalNotes: Deliverence is a special yearly release featuring a Pennsylvania broadleaf wrapper rolled at BLTC Fabrica Oveja Negra factory in Nicaragua. The Nocturne highlights everything about PA Broadleaf, the rich, complex and bold earthiness of the wrapper highlights the unique blend of this cigar. We are also releasing the Deliverance Porcelain featuring a Connecticut wrapper.Â
